content.description: A nice sustained highball, with good holds, the crux is the topout, which requires a very commited heel hook mantle.
content.protection: I'd bring at least 2 pads, 3 would be enough. I did it with 1
content.location: Starting from the Indian Ledge Park entrance off whitney ave. From the parking lot go all the way to the left over a small stream, once crossing over to the otherside go left at the rockwalls, till you walk under the roof

content.description: Very easy to access crags off the blue trail, mainly in the southern section. A famous mountain bike spot with a ton of ledges and drops with tons of boulders littered throughout this park. Some chossy face climbs, steep roofs and some pretty big highballs.
